remark.en: Students who have taken the class ‘Introduction to Earth System Sciences‘(GP1010) before will not be admitted to the class
remark.ch: 研修過地球系統科學概論(課號為AP1010,GP1010)不得選修。

goal.en: .The course content will provide numerous examples from Taiwan for illustration, contemplating Taiwan‘s role as a member of the global village and pondering its future direction. The purpose of the course is to encourage students to enhance their interest in Earth by gaining fundamental knowledge, actively absorbing more related information, and delving into the potential challenges Earth may face in the future. We aim to make this course easily understandable and enjoyable, without the need for mathematical calculations. As long as students have a basic understanding of Earth science from high school, they can comprehend the content. The primary goal is to make students aware of what Earth is, foster an interest in Earth science, and encourage a comprehensive understanding of Earth from various perspectives, fostering a love for our planet.
goal.ch: 地球科學院在核心通識課程開了「認識地球」（下學期），廣泛地介紹地球，從高層大氣到地表面，一直到地函、地心，對於地球做一個總合性的介紹，並結合「全球環境變遷」（上學期），將焦點匯集於地球環境問題。這門課有至少四位老師一起合教，都各有專長。主要的方向，就是把地球分作從高層的太空環境，包括跟行星之間的關係，進入到高層大氣，到低層大氣，所有天氣的變化就在這裡面。然後進入地球表面，包括海洋的、水文的、地形的，再往深處就是地球的動力學、地震、火山、板塊運動，再深入到地球內部的熱對流、地心及磁場產生的機制。最後討論地球能源、地球災害、及地球環境，深入觸及地球未來的課題。我們會特別強調台灣比較常接觸的部分，像地震、颱風、島弧環境、還有人類生活圈，就是地球表面水層、氣層、地層之間的互動關係。內容會舉許多台灣 的例子作為說明，也思考台灣做為地球村的一員，未來該何去何從？課程的目的，是希望學生透過認識地球的基本知識，提高對地球的興趣，願意主動去吸收更多相關的知識，深入瞭解地球未來可能面臨的問題。我們希望把這門課教得易 懂有趣，不需要進行數理計算，只要高中上過基礎地球科學，都可以聽得懂。主要目的是要讓學生知道地球是什麼，進而對地球科學產生興趣，用全方位的角度去了解地球，愛護地球。

.Week 1: Course Introduction.(Horng-Yuan Yen- Dept. of Earth Sciences, Kao-shen Chung- Dept. of Atmospheric Science, Jann-Yenq Liu-Dept. of Space Science and Engineering, Pei-Yuan Chen- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences, Hwa Chien- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences)

Week 8: Humans and Space.(Jann-Yenq Liu-Dept. of Space Science and Engineering)

Week 11: Seismic Activity.(Horng-Yuan Yen- Dept. of Earth Sciences)
Week 12: Natural Disasters.(Horng-Yuan Yen- Dept. of Earth Sciences)
Week 13: Orogeny and Research.(Horng-Yuan Yen- Dept. of Earth Sciences)
Week 14: Introduction to Hydrology - Part 1(Pei-Yuan Chen- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences)
Week 15: Introduction to Hydrology - Part 2(Pei-Yuan Chen- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences)
Week 16 : Introduction to Oceanography - Part 1(Hwa Chien- Institute of Hydrological and Oceanic Sciences)
